txt.en: 'Rumours and whispers say that much is happening in the south, [placeholder]. If what I have heard is true, the Enemy stretches forth his hand and may soon threaten all of Eriador. You would be wise to learn how to travel quickly to southern lands in Eriador, such as Eregion.\n\n'If you wish to do this, travel to Echad Dúnann and speak to an Elf named Tinúriel. I have heard she has explored much of that land and could help you learn Eregion's hidden tracks and paths so that you may travel there more quickly.'

'Hail, [placeholder]. Have you seen much of the Eregion? It has much changed since Elves lived here, and there is little of the Elves left here. I have spent much time learning these changes, so that we can move quickly here to Echad Dúnann unseen by the eyes of the Enemy.

'If you would seek to learn these paths, I would share such knowledge with you. First, though, you must explore Eregion. Many of the landmarks and points I reference would be useless to you unless you saw them first with your own eyes.

'Go and explore Eregion. Once you have done so, return to me, and I shall share with you my knowledge of the secret way to Echad Dúnann.'

'You have explored Eregion, [placeholder]? This is good. These lands are much changed, and there is little of the land that remembers the Elves. Even though we camp here now on an errand for Master Elrond, we soon will be gone, and I fear the land will forget us completely.\n\n'However, those are matters for another day. For now, Elves walk these lands and our knowledge can hamper the efforts of the Enemy. Here, [placeholder], take this guide and learn from it. Use such knowledge well.'
You have been encouraged to learn the hidden tracks and paths of Eregion so that you may travel there more quickly.

'Rumours and whispers say that much is happening in the south, [placeholder]. If what I have heard is true, the Enemy stretches forth his hand and may soon threaten all of Eriador. You would be wise to learn how to travel quickly to southern lands in Eriador, such as Eregion.\n\n'If you wish to do this, travel to Echad Dúnann and speak to an Elf named Tinúriel. I have heard she has explored much of that land and could help you learn Eregion's hidden tracks and paths so that you may travel there more quickly.'
Tinúriel is at Echad Dúnann in Eregion.\n\nYou have been instructed to seek out the Elf Tinúriel to learn more of the ways of Eregion.

'Rumours and whispers say that much is happening in the south, [placeholder]. If what I have heard is true, the Enemy stretches forth his hand and may soon threaten all of Eriador. You would be wise to learn how to travel quickly to southern lands in Eriador, such as Eregion.\n\n'If you wish to do this, travel to Echad Dúnann and speak to an Elf named Tinúriel. I have heard she has explored much of that land and could help you learn Eregion's hidden tracks and paths so that you may travel there more quickly.'

Explore the Elf ruins and dens of the beasts found in Eregion.\n\nTinúriel told you that for you to learn the quickest route to Echad Dúnann in Eregion, you must explore the land and learn its hidden tracks and paths.

Tinúriel is at Echad Dúnann in Eregion.\n\nNow that you have explored Eregion and become familiar with its ruins and the dens of the beasts here, you will be able to understand Tinúriel's instruction on the secret way to Echad Dúnann.
'I can see that you have not yet fully explored Eregion. You must do this first, otherwise my instruction on the hidden path to Echad Dúnann would be useless to you.'
